Job Description: Responsibilities:    Understand customer requirements and translate them into state of the art solution.   Work closely with SW Engineers to design, develop enterprise web applications.   Be flexible and adaptive to project dynamics and be self-learner and self-driver of assigned tasks.   Strong written and verbal communication skills.   You will be working with Mentors initially who will train you on latest technologies    0-1 yrs experience on related technology.   Freshers also can apply  Candidate Profile:    Good analytical skills and Logic Building skills.   Solid object Oriented concepts.   hard-working (no-give up) attitude towards learning new technologies.   Preferred - Good communication skills.
